text: Diggah Islaam diini cabeeh sinni diini baxam-baxsite maray cizbi-cizbi yekkek Nabiyow atu keenik bari kinnito, cagalah ken caagiidah awlaytuh Yalli yan, tohuk lakal Qhiyaamah ayr√≥ usun addunyal abak sugen taamoomi keenih warsele, keenik meqe taama abe mara maqaanel galteleeh uma taama abe mara ken umaanel ken galtele
